title: Pico De Gallo

recipeinfo.blurb: Great mild dip for tortilla chips.
recipeinfo.author: David Horton
recipeinfo.yield: Enough for one bag of torilla chips.

text: . Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour to give the flavors time to mingle.

serving: Serve with tortilla chips for a tongue-tingling appetizer. Pico de gallo may also be used as a topping for tacos or quesadillas.
notes: Adding some minced jalapeno pepper will give the recipe a little kick.
